WingsGF
1lb: $17.50 | 2lb: $29.50 | 3lb: $47.50
Our chicken wings finished with dry rub or sauce, come with celery, carrot & your choice of blue cheese or ranch. Dry Rub: Salt n' pepper, Cajun, roasted red pepper & garlic, lemon pepper, Jerk. Sauce: Whiskey BBQ, jerk, buffalo sauce (mild-medium-hot).
